thread.title: MobileFrame Announces Release of Version 6.1 of its Mobile ERP Platform
thread.title_full: MobileFrame Announces Release of Version 6.1 of its Mobile ERP Platform

author: PATRICIA OSWALT
title: MobileFrame Announces Release of Version 6.1 of its Mobile ERP Platform
text:
MobileFrame , the only 100% code-free mobile ERP platform, announces the release of version 6.1, which enables customers to deploy and manage sophisticated native, web or hybrid applications for iOS, Android, and Windows-based operating systems. Powered by MobileFrame's "write once, deploy anywhere" mobile ERP platform, enterprises can design, build, configure, test and manage custom apps across the entire enterprise with no coding required. Every feature needed for a successful enterprise deployment is built-in, including mobile application development, device management, project administration, GPS tracking, robust synchronization and military-grade security. "Here at MobileFrame, we donâ€™t just innovate; We push the boundaries of how enterprises extend data out to the field with the most sophisticated, yet easy to use, platform available on the market," said Lonny Oswalt, MobileFrame CEO.
Version 6.1 includes a long list of new features and product enhancements. Some highlights include:
NEW FEATURES:
Added Thin Client Server support to its 6.0 Series products (previously available in the 5.0 series only), allowing deployment of robust web applications accessible from any HTML 4/5 compliant browser. Live color previews - as users experiment with color selections, affected items will actively change color on the screen design providing a live preview of the impact color choices have on the app.
ENHANCEMENTS:
Improved database cleanup routines to check for outstanding app in the field before removing the database entries. Improved client monitoring notifications and automatic dismissal of connectivity warning messages.
For more info, please visit http://www.mobileframe.com or follow us on Facebook , Twitter and LinkedIn. 101 Blossom Hill Rd, Los Gatos, CA 95032 | (408) 885-1200 | sales(at)mobileframe(dot)com
